#summary capitalize(text)
#labels api,0.8,view,helper

*Description*:

Returns the text with the first character converted to uppercase and the rest to lowercase.

*Return Type*:

String

*

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *text* || string || true ||  || Text to capitalize ||



*Examples*:

{{{
#capitalize("wheels is a framework")#
-> Wheels is a framework

}}}
